name: Call of Monster Shooter
description:
Call Of Monster Shooter is for those who love playing adventurous shooting games. You can download and play game and let's enjoy most amazing futuristic action-packed fps shooting game. Call of Monster Shooter is new intense 3D First Person Action shooter game and Wonderful controls, 3D graphics, stunning sound effects. Call Of Monster Shooter game is going to be really addictive for the players and smooth, steady controllers. Be careful to play monster shooting game if your shoot is missed so you are definitely going to die.

GAME FEATURES:
- Awesome 3D graphics and amazing environment
- Intuitive on-screen control
- Win more exciting challenges
- First person shooter game

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap fire button to shoot
- Shoot the Monsters
- Change your position to distract the enemy
